QueryType[source]

Enum = [open, closed, solr, epmc, pubmed, andPlusOrPipe, pubmed_no_types]

An enumeration that permits conversion of complex boolean queries to different formats

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class QueryTranslator[source]

QueryTranslator(df, query_col)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

QueryTranslator.__init__[source]

QueryTranslator.__init__(df, query_col)

This class allows a user to define a set of logical boolean queries in a Pandas dataframe and then convert them to a variety of formats for use on various online API systems.
Functionality includes:

  • Specify queries as a table using '|' and '&' symbols
  • generate search strings to be used in API calls for PMID, SOLR, and European PMC

Attributes:

  • df: The dataframe of queries to be processed (note: this dataframe must have a numerical ID column specified)
  • query_col: the column in the data frame where the query is specified
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

QueryTranslator.generate_queries[source]

QueryTranslator.generate_queries(query_type:QueryType)

Use this command to covert the queries to the different forms specified by the QueryType enumeration
